title: Drinkware sets
imageMapSubtitle: Select a vessel from the image below to edit its sliding scale shape and specify liquid volume measurements.

empty.title: No object selected
empty.text: Select a vessel from the drinkware set to edit the sliding scale.

slidingScale.title: Sliding scale shape

missing.title: Sliding scale data missing
missing.text: A sliding scale has not yet been created for this object. Select a base image to create a new sliding scale.

legacy.p1: Sliding scale data for this object is not editable because it is in the legacy format.
legacy.p2: Sliding scales in legacy format can still be used for portion size estimation, however in order to make any changes the sliding scale data needs to be converted into the new format.
legacy.p3: Fillable volume shape (sliding scale outline) will not be automatically converted!
legacy.p4: The sliding scale will be unusable after conversion until the fillable volume shape is defined.

slidingScale.editInstructions: Double click to add a point · single click to select a point · click and drag to move a point · delete key to delete a point
slidingScale.fillableAreaToggle: Show old fillable area image overlay

clearScaleDialog.title: Are you sure?
clearScaleDialog.msg:
You're about to delete the sliding scale shape data.
 This action cannot be undone.

legacy.p1: These volume measurements likely come from the legacy sliding scale format that only stores the normalised liquid height values, remapped to the [0, 1] range.
legacy.p2: Portion size estimation calculations use the normalised values so this data is still valid, but the original height measurements in mm are not available.
